Export.Routine: INAUFD12 ;INAUFD12;FIS;INFO CHANGE REQUISITION TO BURCHASE ORDER;04.05.2004 ; ;/------------------------------------------------------------------\ ;| Description of Function : ;| INFO CHANGE REQUISITION TO BURCHASE ORDER ;| ;| Inputs : ;| ;| ;| ByRef : ;| ;| ;| Returns : ;| ;| ;| History : ;| ;| FIS 04.05.2004 ;| ;\------------------------------------------------------------------/ ; QUIT:$GET(YINHALT)="" NEW SATZ SET SATZ=$GET(^WWWDATEN(YM,+$HOROLOG,YUSER,YFORM,"D",1)) IF $PIECE(SATZ,Y,2)=5 DO . IF $PIECE(SATZ,Y,265)'=1 SET %TXT(1)="!"_$$^WWWTEXT(33858,,1) QUIT ;CHANGE REQUISITION TO ORDER . SET %TXT(1)="!"_$$^WWWTEXT(144,,1)_" ("_$$^WWWFELDNAME("INAUF","D",265)_")" ;NICHT MÃ–GLICH ;Not potential . QUIT QUIT
